site.name: LearnMappers
site.title: LearnMappers — Business Identity Shaper
site.description: Unified LearnMappers platform combining Headquarters Development (HQDEV) and Family Office Administration (FOADMIN) services, resources, and capabilities.
site.author: LearnMappers
site.tagline: Headquarters Development • Family Office Administration — done right
site.mission: LearnMappers maps your setup so you can keep it working. Unified platform combining HQDEV (homesteading, handyman, carpentry, electrical, gardening) and FOADMIN (family office administration, tech services, systems, education).

seo.metaDescription: LearnMappers: Headquarters Development (homesteading, handyman, carpentry, electrical, gardening) and Family Office Administration (administrative services, tech support, systems management, education, compliance). Complete solutions for home, office, and business operations.

hero.title: Headquarters Development • Family Office Administration — Complete Solutions
hero.subtitle: From homesteading to administrative excellence. Systems, services, and support that keep everything working.
hero.description: LearnMappers provides comprehensive Headquarters Development (homesteading, handyman, carpentry, electrical, gardening) and Family Office Administration (administrative services, tech support, systems management, compliance, education). We map your setup so you can keep it working—at home, in the office, and across your operations.

categories.title: Furniture Assembly
categories.description: Get your furniture built right the first time. Professional assembly that saves you hours of frustration and ensures everything is level, secure, and ready to use.

services.title: Furniture Assembly
services.description: Get your furniture built right the first time. Professional assembly that saves you hours of frustration and ensures everything is level, secure, and ready to use.
services.purpose: Transform flat-pack boxes into functional, stable furniture that lasts. Save time, avoid mistakes, and ensure proper assembly with professional tools and techniques.
outcomes: Save 2-6 hours of your time per piece
Avoid costly mistakes and damaged parts
Get furniture that's actually level and stable
Extend furniture lifespan with proper assembly
Have documentation for future moves or repairs
services.whyNeed: You need this if you've ever spent hours on assembly only to find it wobbly, if you lack the right tools, if you want it done right the first time, or if your time is worth more than the frustration of DIY assembly.
whatYouGet: Properly assembled furniture that's level and stable
Time saved (hours of your life back)
No stripped screws or broken parts
Professional finish with proper tooling
Documentation of assembly for future reference
Warranty on workmanship
Peace of mind knowing it's done right

services.title: Furniture Assembly
services.description: Flat-pack and custom sets built square, level, and secure.
services.purpose: Deliver ready-to-use furniture without stress or rework.
features: Clean work area and tidy finish
outcomes: No missing parts or loose joints
Ready to use the same day
whatYouCanBuild: Beds, frames, dressers, desks, tables, shelving
services.whyNeed: Get a pro build with the right tools and a neat finish.

services.title: Mounting & Installations
services.description: TVs, shelves, blinds, and art—mounted clean and secure.
services.purpose: Protect walls and devices with correct anchors and layout.
whatYouCanBuild: TV mounts, floating shelves, curtain rods, blinds, art walls
services.whyNeed: Achieve a safe, aligned look with correct hardware.

services.title: TV & General Mounting
services.description: Mount your TV safely and beautifully. Professional installation that finds studs, ensures level mounting, and hides cables for a clean, professional look.
services.purpose: Safely mount TVs, soundbars, and displays at the perfect height and angle while hiding cables and ensuring structural integrity. Create a clean, professional entertainment setup.

Maximize viewing comfort with proper height
whatYouCanBuild: TV wall mounts (fixed, tilt, or full-motion)
Soundbar mounting below or above TV
services.whyNeed: You need this if you want to avoid hitting electrical wires or pipes, if you want it level (not crooked), if you want cables hidden (not a mess), or if you want it secure (not falling off the wall).
whatYouGet: TV mounted at perfect viewing height and angle
Hidden cables for clean, professional look
Secure mounting that won't fall
Proper stud finding (no drywall damage)
Level installation (no crooked screens)
Space saved in your room
Professional finish that looks great

categories.title: AI & RAG
categories.description: Build private AI systems that understand your data. Deploy RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems that give you AI assistants trained on your own documents, knowledge base, and information.

services.title: AI & RAG
services.description: Build private AI systems that understand your data. Deploy RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems that give you AI assistants trained on your own documents, knowledge base, and information.
services.purpose: Create private, secure AI systems that understand your specific data and knowledge. Build RAG systems that let you query your documents, get intelligent answers, and automate knowledge work without sending data to third parties.
outcomes: Save 10-20 hours per week on document research
Get instant answers from thousands of documents
Keep sensitive data private (no third-party AI)
Create custom AI solutions for your business
Reduce costs vs. API-based AI services
whatYouCanBuild: Private LLM servers (Ollama, vLLM, or cloud)
RAG systems with vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant)
Document Q&A systems for your knowledge base
Custom AI chatbots for your business
services.whyNeed: You need this if you want AI that knows YOUR business, if you need private AI (no data leaves your control), if you want to query thousands of documents instantly, or if you want to automate knowledge work with AI trained on your data.
whatYouGet: Private AI server that keeps your data secure
RAG system that understands your documents
Ability to query thousands of files instantly
AI assistant trained on YOUR knowledge base
Automated document processing and insights
Custom AI workflows for your business
No data sent to third-party AI services

categories.title: LearnMappers Research & Systems
categories.description: Educational sessions, workflow mapping, and system reports.

services.title: Research & Systems Support
services.description: Map how your home, tools, and tech work together.
services.purpose: Teach and document your systems for easy upkeep.
whatYouCanBuild: System maps, quick SOPs, asset lists
services.whyNeed: Learn and improve while tasks get done.

categories.title: LearnMappers — Research & Education
categories.description: Educational research, mapping, and documentation (no advice, no drafting, no representation).

services.title: Legal & Compliance Literacy
services.description: Learn what statutes and rules say, side-by-side with definitions and plain-language maps.
services.purpose: Teach the boundary between education and advice and show verified sources.
services.whyNeed: To understand the system safely before speaking with licensed counsel.

services.title: UCC Articles 3 & 9 Studies
services.description: Educational study of negotiable instruments and secured transactions.
services.purpose: Show elements, timelines, and interactions of Articles 3 and 9 with diagrams.
services.whyNeed: To classify 'paper' and collateral correctly in learning contexts.

services.title: Credit & Capital Literacy
services.description: Understand credit reports, scores, public lending guides, and IUL mechanics (education-only).
services.purpose: Teach systems — not recommend actions.
services.whyNeed: To learn how credit and policy cash values are described in public sources.

services.title: Privacy, Entities & Jurisdictions (Education)
services.description: Why privacy matters, public vs. private capacity, and how jurisdictions differ (education-only).
services.purpose: Teach concepts used in family-office-style literacy.
services.whyNeed: To understand design choices before speaking with licensed counsel.

services.title: Enforcement Chain & Governance Mapping
services.description: Map regulators, license ladders, appeals, and oversight channels.
services.purpose: Know who regulates whom and where review paths run (education-only).
services.whyNeed: To orient before engaging any process.

faq.question: What areas do you serve?
faq.answer: We serve the San Francisco Bay Area, including Oakland, Berkeley, and surrounding areas.

faq.question: How do I book a service?
faq.answer: Book through TaskRabbit using the 'Book now' button, or contact us directly.

faq.question: Do you provide documentation?
faq.answer: Yes! All work is documented in the LearnMappers system for future reference.

faq.question: What tools do you bring?
faq.answer: We bring all necessary tools for the job. You don't need to provide anything.

faq.question: Do you offer warranties?
faq.answer: Yes, we stand behind our work. Contact us if you have any issues.

disclaimers.text: LearnMappers provides educational research and logistical documentation only. We do not provide legal, tax, or financial advice; we do not draft, file, or represent. All service names are written in full for clarity; abbreviations are not used in client-facing materials.

form.successMessage: Thank you! We'll get back to you soon.
form.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error. Please try again.
